titles.title: O Hallelujah! His Kingdom Is Come

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Hallelujah! His kingdom is come.
O Hallelujah! His work is getting done.
O Hallelujah! We'll shout the victory
For the Kingdom is come and it's within you and me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will rejoice for this is the day
The Kingdom has come and all fear is gone away.
So I will sing and shout the victory
For the Kingdom is come and it's within you and me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So just like David in the days of old
We've danced before the Lord, and so the story's told.
So we too must join in the fight
And dance before the Lord and praise with all our might!
